# Ivan's Portfolio

> Full Stack Web Developer specializing in React, TypeScript, and Modern Web Technologies.

## Sections

- [Home](/) - Introduction and Hero section.
- [Projects](/proyectos) - Showcase of recent web development work and applications.
- [Experience](/experiencia) - Professional history and roles.
- [Skills](/skills) - Technical stack including React, Node.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS.
- [About](/sobre-mi) - Personal background and philosophy.
- [Contact](/contacto) - Channels for professional inquiries.

## Technical Details

- **Stack**: React 19, Vite, Tailwind CSS 4, TypeScript.
- **Goals**: Creating high-performance, accessible, and aesthetically pleasing web experiences.
